艻字的基本解释

艻
lè
〔萝艻〕一种香草。

艻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lè］
［《廣韻》盧則切，入德，來。］
通“扐”。手指之间。古人占卜时数蓍草以卜吉凶，占筮者以数剩零馀蓍草挂于手指之间称为“艻”。
[②]［jí］
棘木。
[③]［chú］
同“鋤1”。

艻字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　艻； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页1017第04
【唐韻】盧則切【韻會】【正韻】歷德切，?音勒。蘿艻，香菜。亦云胡荽屬。　又藥名。【本草】牛脂艻。【註】應驗良方，治七孔出血。　又與扐通。【揚子·太?經】幷餘于艻，一艻之後，而數其餘。　又音棘。木名。【通鑑】唐大中中，王式爲安南都護。至交趾，樹艻木爲柵，可支數十年。【胡三省註】其字从艸从力，讀與棘同，羊矢棗也。此木可以支久。

艻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
艻字的起名意思

一种香草。

艻
Basic explanation of words
艻
lè
[Luo Fu] A kind of vanilla.
艻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lè］
["Guangyun" Lu Zeqi, enter Germany, come. ]
Same as "扐". Between the fingers. The ancients used yarrow in divination to call for good or bad luck, and those who used the number of yarrow left over were hung between their fingers and were called "艻".
[②]［jí］
Thornwood.
[③] [chú]
Same as "hoe 1".
艻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Kezi] 　艻; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 1017 04
[Tang Yun] Lu Zeqie [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Li Deqie,? Yinle. Luofu, coriander. Yiyun coriander is a genus.　Also the name of the medicine. [Materia Medica] Beef tallow. [Note] A good prescription should be used to treat bleeding from seven holes.　Connect with the stick again. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】The rest is on the 艻, one 艻 later, and the rest is counted.　Sound thorn again. Wooden name. 【Tong Jian】Tang Dazhong, Wang Shi is the protector of Annan. As far as Cochin, the tree and the wood are the palisades, which can be supported for decades. 【Notes from Hu Sanxing】The words are from the 艸congli, and the pronunciation is the same as that of the thorns. This wood can last for a long time.
艻
